gw.api.soap

Class SOAPServiceBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.soap.SOAPServiceBase

  • public class SOAPServiceBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for auto generated soap API classes.

    • Method Detail

      • makeCall

        public java.lang.Object makeCall(javax.xml.namespace.QName portName,
                        org.apache.axis.description.OperationDesc operation,
                        java.lang.String soapAction,
                        int opStyle,
                        int useValue,
                        boolean hasMime,
                        java.lang.Object[] params)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Internal method used to make the low level call. Do not call directly
        Parameters:
        portName -
        operation - an operation description for the call that will be invoked.
        soapAction -
        opStyle -
        useValue -
        hasMime - true if this call has mime content.
        params - the parameters to invoke the call with
        Returns:
        the results of the call
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getURL

        public java.lang.String getURL()
        Returns the local URL if non-null, otherwise returns the endpoint URL.
        Returns:
        the local URL if non-null, otherwise returns the endpoint URL

      • addHandler

        public void addHandler(CallHandler handler)
        Call handlers are used to intercept SOAP calls. Two events are provided to intercept the call before it is made or after it has left.
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler to add

      • setLogging

        public void setLogging(org.apache.log4j.Logger logger,
              org.apache.log4j.Priority level)
        Sets the logging for this API. This can be used to temporarily add logging to the call handler for debugging.

        When set, this class will log all outbound and inbound SOAP XML.

        Parameters:
        logger - the logger to log to
        level - the log level to log at.

      • setLoggingOutputStream

        public void setLoggingOutputStream(java.io.PrintStream outputStream)
        Sets the logging output stream for this API. This can be used to temporarily add logging to the call handler for debugging.

        When set, this class will log all outbound and inbound SOAP XML.

        Parameters:
        outputStream - the stream to log to. Typically java.lang.System.out or java.lang.System.err

      • getHandlers

        public java.util.List<CallHandler> getHandlers()
        Returns the handlers registered for this service.
        Returns:
        the handlers registered for this service

      • addGWAuthentication

        public void addGWAuthentication()
        Adds guidewire specific authentication tags to the headers of the soap service. The authentication information is fetched from the endpoint authentication.
        WARNING: This only adds the tags if guidewire authentication was chosen.
